item.title: GOALS AND OBJECTIVES OF ACTIVITIES of the State Educational Institution "Gymnasium No. 51 of Gomel" for the 2022/2023 academic year
item.description: Problem - Improving the quality of education through the personal and social development of each student, improving the system of pedagogical tools to achieve maximum results in teaching and educating students. Goal - Creating conditions for the successful functioning and development of an educational institution aimed at developing computer literacy of teachers in a digital educational environment and ensuring an increase in the efficiency and quality of education. Tasks: ensure the improvement of the quality of education through: the formation of students’ meta-subject skills and abilities through the introduction by teachers of modern educational trends, in particular, the approaches that are implemented in the tasks of the international study of the quality of education PISA; ensuring the relationship of training and education through the implementation of the educational potential of educational, optional classes and classes during extracurricular time; implementation of STEAM approaches in the process of education and upbringing; implementation of correction and regulation of the educational process, taking into account the results of republican monitoring;
